title: Neon Lantern Heist
shortDescription: Outrun rival crews under a canopy of neon lanterns before the loot ships out.
longDescription: A glow-soaked caper weaving between vendors, rooftop relays, and contraband ferries. Balance stealth with speed as you outmaneuver rival crews under the lantern lights.

canonicalGame.title: Neon Lantern Heist
canonicalGame.shortDescription: Race through midnight markets to reclaim the stolen lantern core before it vanishes offshore.
canonicalGame.longDescription: A glow-soaked caper weaving between vendors, rooftop relays, and contraband ferries. Balance stealth with speed as you outmaneuver rival crews under the lantern lights.
